transliteration_en: Wa nabbi'hum 'an daifi Ibraaheem
translation_en: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,
translation_id: Kabarkanlah (Nabi Muhammad) kepada mereka tentang tamu Ibrahim (malaikat)

arabic: اِذْ دَخَلُوْا عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوْا سَلٰمًاۗ قَالَ اِنَّا مِنْكُمْ وَجِلُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala innaa minkum wajiloon
transliteration_id: Iż dakhalū ‘alaihi fa qālū salāmā(n), qāla innā minkum wajilūn(a).
translation_en: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you."
translation_id: ketika mereka berkunjung ke (kediaman)-nya, lalu mengucapkan, “Salam.” Dia (Ibrahim) berkata, “Sesungguhnya kami merasa takut kepadamu.”

arabic: قَالُوْا لَا تَوْجَلْ اِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلٰمٍ عَلِيْمٍ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo la tawjal innaa nubashshiruka bighulaamin 'aleem
transliteration_id: Qālū lā taujal innā nubasysyiruka bigulāmin ‘alīm(in).
translation_en: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."
translation_id: (Mereka) berkata, “Janganlah merasa takut (karena) sesungguhnya kami memberi kabar gembira kepadamu dengan (kelahiran) anak laki-laki yang alim (Ishaq).”

arabic: قَالَ اَبَشَّرْتُمُوْنِيْ عَلٰٓى اَنْ مَّسَّنِيَ الْكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala abashshartumoonee 'alaaa am massaniyal kibaru fabima tubashshiroon
transliteration_id: Qāla abasysyartumūnī ‘alā am massaniyal-kibaru fa bima tubasysyirūn(a).
translation_en: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform?"
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) berkata, “Benarkah kamu memberi kabar gembira kepadaku, padahal usiaku telah lanjut. Maka, dengan (cara) apa kamu memberi kabar gembira?”

arabic: قَالُوْا بَشَّرْنٰكَ بِالْحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُنْ مِّنَ الْقٰنِطِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo bashsharnaaka bilhaqqi falaa takum minal qaaniteen
transliteration_id: Qālū basysyarnāka bil-ḥaqqi falā takum minal-qāniṭīn(a).
translation_en: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."
translation_id: Mereka menjawab, “Kami menyampaikan kabar gembira kepadamu dengan benar. Maka, janganlah engkau termasuk orang yang berputus asa.”

arabic: قَالَ وَمَنْ يَّقْنَطُ مِنْ رَّحْمَةِ رَبِّهٖٓ اِلَّا الضَّاۤلُّوْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala wa mai yaqnatu mir rahmati Rabbiheee illad daaaloon
transliteration_id: Qāla wa may yaqnaṭu mir raḥmati rabbihī illaḍ-ḍāllūn(a).
translation_en: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) berkata, “Adakah orang yang berputus asa dari rahmat Tuhannya selain orang yang sesat?”

transliteration_en: Qaala famaa khatbukum aiyuhal mursaloon
translation_en: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) bertanya, “Apa urusan pentingmu, wahai para utusan?”

arabic: قَالُوْٓا اِنَّآ اُرْسِلْنَآ اِلٰى قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen
transliteration_id: Qālū innā ursilnā ilā qaumim mujrimīn(a).
translation_en: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,
translation_id: Mereka menjawab, “Sesungguhnya kami diutus kepada kaum yang berdosa (untuk menyiksanya),

arabic: اِلَّآ اٰلَ لُوْطٍۗ اِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوْهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Illaaa Aala Loot; innaa lamunajjoohum ajma'een
transliteration_id: Illā āla lūṭ(in), innā lamunajjūhum ajma‘īn(a).
translation_en: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all
translation_id: kecuali para pengikut Lut. Sesungguhnya kami pasti menyelamatkan mereka semua,

arabic: اِلَّا امْرَاَتَهٗ قَدَّرْنَآ اِنَّهَا لَمِنَ الْغٰبِرِيْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Illam ra atahoo qaddarnaaa innahaa laminal ghaabireen
translation_en: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind.
translation_id: kecuali istrinya. Kami telah menentukan bahwa sesungguhnya dia termasuk (orang-orang kafir) yang tertinggal.”

transliteration_en: Falamma jaaa'a Aala Lootinil mursaloon
translation_en: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,
translation_id: Maka, ketika para utusan itu datang kepada para pengikut Lut,

transliteration_en: Qaala innakum qawmum munkaroon
translation_en: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown."
translation_id: dia berkata, “Sesungguhnya kamu orang-orang yang tidak kami kenal.”

arabic: قَالُوْا بَلْ جِئْنٰكَ بِمَا كَانُوْا فِيْهِ يَمْتَرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo bal ji'naaka bimaa kaanoo feehi yamtaroon
transliteration_id: Qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūn(a).
translation_en: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,
translation_id: Mereka (para utusan) menjawab, “Kami justru datang kepadamu membawa azab yang selalu mereka dustakan.

transliteration_en: Wa atainaaka bilhaqqi wa innaa lasaadiqoon
transliteration_id: Wa ataināka bil-ḥaqqi wa innā laṣādiqūn(a).
translation_en: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful.
translation_id: Kami datang kepadamu membawa kebenaran. Sesungguhnya kami orang-orang yang benar.

arabic: فَاَسْرِ بِاَهْلِكَ بِقِطْعٍ مِّنَ الَّيْلِ وَاتَّبِعْ اَدْبَارَهُمْ وَلَا يَلْتَفِتْ مِنْكُمْ اَحَدٌ وَّامْضُوْا حَيْثُ تُؤْمَرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Fa asri bi ahlika biqit'im minal laili wattabi' adbaarahum wa laa yaltafit minkum ahadunw wamdoo haisu tu'maroon
transliteration_id: Fa asri bi'ahlika biqiṭ‘im minal-laili wattabi‘ adbārahum wa lā yaltafit minkum aḥaduw wamḍū ḥaiṡu tu'marūn(a).
translation_en: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded."
translation_id: Maka, pergilah pada akhir malam beserta keluargamu dan ikutilah mereka dari belakang. Jangan seorang pun di antara kamu menoleh ke belakang dan teruskanlah perjalanan ke tempat yang diperintahkan kepadamu.”

arabic: وَقَضَيْنَآ اِلَيْهِ ذٰلِكَ الْاَمْرَ اَنَّ دَابِرَ هٰٓؤُلَاۤءِ مَقْطُوْعٌ مُّصْبِحِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa qadainaaa ilaihi zaalikal amra anna daabira haaa'ulaaa'i maqtoo'um musbiheen
transliteration_id: Wa qaḍainā ilaihi żālikal-amra anna dābira hā'ulā'i maqṭū‘um muṣbiḥīn(a).
translation_en: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning.
translation_id: Telah Kami wahyukan kepadanya (Lut) keputusan itu bahwa akhirnya mereka akan ditumpas habis pada waktu subuh.

transliteration_en: Wa jaaa'a ahlul madeenati yastabshiroon
translation_en: And the people of the city came rejoicing.
translation_id: Datanglah penduduk kota itu (ke rumah Lut) dengan gembira (karena kedatangan tamu itu).

arabic: قَالَ اِنَّ هٰٓؤُلَاۤءِ ضَيْفِيْ فَلَا تَفْضَحُوْنِۙ
transliteration_en: Qaala inna haaa'ulaaa'i daifee falaa tafdahoon
transliteration_id: Qāla inna hā'ulā'i ḍaifī falā tafḍaḥūn(i).
translation_en: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me.
translation_id: Dia (Lut) berkata, “Sesungguhnya mereka adalah tamuku. Maka, jangan mempermalukanku.

transliteration_en: Wattaqul laaha wa laa tukhzoon
translation_en: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me."
translation_id: Bertakwalah kepada Allah dan jangan membuatku terhina.”

transliteration_en: Qaalooo awalam nanhaka 'anil 'aalameen
translation_en: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people?"
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Bukankah kami telah melarangmu (menerima) manusia (para tamu)?”

arabic: قَالَ هٰٓؤُلَاۤءِ بَنٰتِيْٓ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ فٰعِلِيْنَۗ
transliteration_en: Qaala haaa'ulaaa'i banaateee in kuntum faa'ileen
transliteration_id: Qāla hā'ulā'i banātī in kuntum fā‘ilīn(a).
translation_en: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
translation_id: Dia (Lut) berkata, “Mereka itulah putri-putri (negeri)-ku. (Nikahilah mereka) jika kamu hendak berbuat (memenuhi nafsu syahwatmu).”

transliteration_en: La'amruka innahum lafee sakratihim ya'mahoon
translation_en: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly.
translation_id: (Allah berfirman,) “Demi umurmu (Nabi Muhammad), sungguh, mereka terombang-ambing dalam kemabukan (demi melampiaskan hawa nafsu).”

transliteration_en: Fa akhazat humus saihatu mushriqeen
translation_en: So the shriek seized them at sunrise.
translation_id: Maka, mereka dibinasakan oleh suara keras yang mengguntur ketika matahari terbit.

arabic: فَجَعَلْنَا عَالِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَاَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّنْ سِجِّيْلٍ
transliteration_en: Faja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa wa amtamaa 'alaihim hijaaratam min sjijjeel
transliteration_id: Fa ja‘alnā ‘āliyahā sāfilahā wa amṭarnā ‘alaihim ḥijāratam min sijjīl(in).
translation_en: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay.
translation_id: Maka, Kami menjungkirbalikkan (negeri itu) dan Kami menghujani mereka dengan tanah yang membatu.

transliteration_en: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil lilmutawassimeen
translation_en: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya pada yang demikian itu benar-benar terdapat tanda-tanda (kekuasaan Allah) bagi orang-orang yang memperhatikan (dengan saksama) tanda-tanda (itu).

transliteration_en: Wa innahaa labi sabeelim muqeem
translation_en: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya (negeri) itu benar-benar terletak di jalan yang masih tetap (dilalui manusia).

transliteration_en: Inna fee zaalika la Aayatal lilmu'mineen
translation_en: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya pada yang demikian itu benar-benar terdapat tanda (kekuasaan Allah) bagi orang-orang mukmin.

transliteration_en: Wa in kaana Ashaabul Aikati lazaalimeen
translation_en: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya penduduk Aikah itu benar-benar orang-orang yang zalim.

transliteration_en: Fantaqamnaa minhum wa innahumaa labi imaamim mubeen
transliteration_id: Fantaqamnā minhum, wa innahumā labi'imāmim mubīn(in).
translation_en: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway.
translation_id: Maka, Kami membinasakan mereka. Sesungguhnya kedua (negeri) itu terletak di satu jalur jalan raya.

transliteration_en: Wa laqad kazzaba ashaabul Hijril mursaleen
translation_en: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya penduduk (negeri) Hijr benar-benar telah mendustakan para rasul (mereka),

transliteration_en: Wa aatainaahum Aayaatinaa fakaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen
transliteration_id: Wa ātaināhum āyātinā fa kānū ‘anhā mu‘riḍīn(a).
translation_en: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away.
translation_id: Kami telah mendatangkan kepada mereka tanda-tanda (kekuasaan) Kami, tetapi mereka selalu berpaling darinya.

arabic: وَكَانُوْا يَنْحِتُوْنَ مِنَ الْجِبَالِ بُيُوْتًا اٰمِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa kaanoo yanhitoona minal jibaali buyootan aamineen
transliteration_id: Wa kānū yanḥitūna minal-jibāli buyūtan āminīn(a).
translation_en: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure.
translation_id: Mereka memahat gunung-gunung (batu) menjadi rumah-rumah (yang didiami) dengan rasa aman.

transliteration_en: Fa akhazat humus saihatu musbiheen
translation_en: But the shriek seized them at early morning.
translation_id: Kemudian mereka dibinasakan oleh suara keras yang mengguntur pada pagi hari,

arabic: فَمَآ اَغْنٰى عَنْهُمْ مَّا كَانُوْا يَكْسِبُوْنَۗ
transliteration_en: Famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon
translation_en: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn.
translation_id: sehingga tidak berguna bagi mereka apa yang telah mereka usahakan.

arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ اِلَّا بِالْحَقِّۗ وَاِنَّ السَّاعَةَ لَاٰتِيَةٌ فَاصْفَحِ الصَّفْحَ الْجَمِيْلَ
transliteration_en: Wa maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqq; wa innas Saa'ata la aatiyatun fasfahis safhal jameel
transliteration_id: Wa mā khalaqnas-samāwāti wal-arḍa  wa mā bainahumā illā bil-ḥaqq(i), wa innas-sā‘ata la'ātiyatun faṣfaḥiṣ-ṣafḥal-jamīl(a).
translation_en: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness.
translation_id: Kami tidak menciptakan langit dan bumi serta apa yang ada di antara keduanya, melainkan dengan benar. Sesungguhnya kiamat pasti akan datang. Maka, maafkanlah (mereka) dengan cara yang baik.

transliteration_en: Inna Rabbaka Huwal khallaaqul 'aleem
translation_en: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Tuhanmulah Yang Maha Pencipta lagi Maha Mengetahui.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ اٰتَيْنٰكَ سَبْعًا مِّنَ الْمَثَانِيْ وَالْقُرْاٰنَ الْعَظِيْمَ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad aatainaaka sab'am mnal masaanee wal Qur-aanal 'azeem
transliteration_id: Wa laqad ātaināka sab‘am minal-maṡānī wal-qur'ānal-‘aẓīm(a).
translation_en: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an.
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar menganugerahkan kepadamu tujuh (ayat) yang (dibaca) berulang-ulang dan Al-Qur’an yang agung.

arabic: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ اِلٰى مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهٖٓ اَزْوَاجًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَاخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa maa matta 'naa biheee azwaajam minhum wa laa tahzan 'alaihim wakhfid janaahaka lilmu 'mineen
transliteration_id: Lā tamuddanna ‘ainaika ilā mā matta‘nā bihī azwājam minhum wa lā taḥzan ‘alaihim wakhfiḍ janāḥaka lil-mu'minīn(a).
translation_en: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers
translation_id: Jangan sekali-kali engkau (Nabi Muhammad) menujukan pandanganmu (tergiur) pada kenikmatan hidup yang telah Kami berikan kepada beberapa golongan di antara mereka (orang kafir). Jangan engkau bersedih hati atas (kesesatan) mereka dan berendahhatilah engkau terhadap orang-orang mukmin.

transliteration_en: Wa qul inneee anan nazeerul mubeen
translation_en: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -
translation_id: Katakanlah (Nabi Muhammad), “Sesungguhnya aku adalah pemberi peringatan yang jelas.”

transliteration_en: Kamaaa anzalnaa 'alal muqtasimeen
translation_en: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators
translation_id: Sebagaimana (Kami telah memberi peringatan), Kami (juga) telah menurunkan (azab) kepada orang yang memilah-milah (Kitab Allah),

transliteration_en: Allazeena ja'alul Quraana'ideen
translation_en: Who have made the Qur'an into portions.
translation_id: (yaitu) orang-orang yang telah menjadikan Al-Qur’an itu terbagi-bagi.

transliteration_en: Fawa Rabbika lanas'a lannahum ajma'een
translation_en: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all
translation_id: Maka, demi Tuhanmu, Kami pasti akan menanyai mereka semua

transliteration_en: 'Ammaa kaanoo ya'maloon
translation_en: About what they used to do.
translation_id: tentang apa yang telah mereka kerjakan.

arabic: فَاصْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَاَعْرِضْ عَنِ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Fasda' bimaa tu'maru wa a'rid anil mushrikeen
translation_en: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists.
translation_id: Maka, sampaikanlah (Nabi Muhammad) secara terang-terangan segala apa yang diperintahkan kepadamu dan berpalinglah dari orang-orang musyrik.

transliteration_en: Innaa kafainaakal mustahzi'een
translation_en: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers
translation_id: Sesungguhnya cukuplah Kami yang memeliharamu (Nabi Muhammad) dari (kejahatan) orang yang memperolok-olokkan(-mu),

arabic: الَّذِيْنَ يَجْعَلُوْنَ مَعَ اللّٰهِ اِلٰهًا اٰخَرَۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Allazeena yaj'aloona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; fasawfa ya'lamoon
transliteration_id: Allażīna yaj‘alūna ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhar(a), fa saufa ya‘lamūn(a).
translation_en: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know.
translation_id: (yaitu) orang yang menganggap adanya tuhan selain Allah. Mereka kelak akan mengetahui (akibatnya).

arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَعْلَمُ اَنَّكَ يَضِيْقُ صَدْرُكَ بِمَا يَقُوْلُوْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad na'lamu annak yadeequ sadruka bimaa yaqooloon
transliteration_id: Wa laqad na‘lamu annaka yaḍīqu ṣadruka bimā yaqūlūn(a).
translation_en: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say.
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar mengetahui bahwa dadamu menjadi sempit (gundah dan sedih) disebabkan apa yang mereka ucapkan.

arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُنْ مِّنَ السّٰجِدِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Fasbbih bihamdi Rabbika wa kum minas saajideen
transliteration_id: Fa sabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wa kum minas-sājidīn(a).
translation_en: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him].
translation_id: Maka, bertasbihlah dengan memuji Tuhanmu, jadilah engkau termasuk orang-orang yang sujud (salat),

transliteration_en: Wa'bud Rabbaka hattaa yaatiyakal yaqeen
translation_en: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).
translation_id: dan sembahlah Tuhanmu sampai datang kepadamu kepastian (kematian).
